text: (Ranti) nigba ti Oluwa re gba adehun lowo awon omo Adam, O fa aromodomo won jade lati (ibadi ni) eyin (baba nla) won, O si fi won se elerii lori ara won pe: “Se Emi ko ni Oluwa yin ni?” Won so pe: “Rara – (Iwo ni Oluwa wa) - a jerii si i.” Nitori ki e ma baa so ni Ojo Ajinde pe: "Dajudaju awa je alaimo nipa eyi
